name: Super Heat Boy
description:
Super Heat Boy is a platformer game about a boy who is overheated :)
Find it out by pressing the X key you can defeat the enemies with your heat.

Well i called the game previoslly "Jake the Heatboy" (to have something starting with a "J") - but "Super Heat Boy" felt more friendly to me.

As it is a prototype and as i started really late the jam (about 3 days ago) the game is not very long at all.

Credits:
All Assets are made by me (including Music and Sfx).
